posts.post_content: 3 mana for a bunch of 3/3s? Sure it's not immediate but it's not like the only reason you're casting artifacts after you play this is to put charge counters on it. In addition to whatever you're getting from your other artifacts, you're getting 3/3s! And it doesn't even require a tap or mana ability.

posts.post_content:
I'm trying to build a deck entirely around this card, just to see if it can be fast (without breaking it like Mindbend did). So far I'm using [Ornithopter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ornithopter), [Esperzoa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Esperzoa), and [Wall of Junk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wall of Junk) for constant triggers, then [Mirran Spy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirran Spy), [Grand Architect](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grand Architect), and [Etherium Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Etherium Sculptor) as the speed engine, with [Prophetic Prism](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Prophetic Prism) for a cheap artie with a "draw a card" effect. Oh, and because they help pull out [Mishra, Artificer Prodigy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mishra, Artificer Prodigy). I'm also using [Steady Progress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Steady Progress) instead of contagion clasp for the cantrip, so I can get more arties.  
  
I've also wondered about Golem foundry with [Steady Progress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Steady Progress) and [Volt Charge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Volt Charge), and [pyromancer ascension](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=pyromancer ascension) with [archmage ascension](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=archmage ascension) just cause I like that combo :)...
posts.html:
I'm trying to build a deck entirely around this card, just to see if it can be fast (without breaking it like Mindbend did). So far I'm using Ornithopter, Esperzoa, and Wall of Junk for constant triggers, then Mirran Spy, Grand Architect, and Etherium Sculptor as the speed engine, with Prophetic Prism for a cheap artie with a "draw a card" effect. Oh, and because they help pull out Mishra, Artificer Prodigy. I'm also using Steady Progress instead of contagion clasp for the cantrip, so I can get more arties.

I've also wondered about Golem foundry with Steady Progress and Volt Charge, and pyromancer ascension with archmage ascension just cause I like that combo :)...
